subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The University of Oregon agreed that violations occurred in its football program, but the N.C.A.A.’s unwieldy enforcement process offers little disincentive for any school to cheat.
snippet: The University of Oregon agreed that violations occurred in its football program, but the N.C.A.A.’s unwieldy enforcement process offers little disincentive for any school to cheat.
